newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Cowen explains Burr-Brown.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Cowen explains Burr-Brown.

text.p: -- Cowen & Co analyst Mike Lins said the firm upgraded Burr-Brown Corp due to strengthened customer demand, a rising backlog, and likely prospects for accelerated revenue and earnings growth, as well as a fairly inexpensive product compared to other standard analog integrated circuits.
-- stock upped to strong buy from buy.
-- expects revenue growth of 15 percent and earnings growth of 25 percent this year.
-- raised earnings estimate to $1.25 per share from $1.13 for 1997, and to $1.57 from $1.50.
-- set 12-month price target of $31. Shares rose 2-7/16 to 23-1/8.
